
# Where we are headed 

```{r pipe_data.table, echo = F, eval = T, fig.height=5}
library(data.table)
library(gapminder)
library(magrittr)
library(ggplot2)
gapminder %>% 
  as.data.table() %>% 
   .[year > 1980] %>% 
   .[                       , 
     mean(gdpPercap)        , 
     by = .(continent, year) ] %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = year) +
  aes(y = V1) + 
  labs(y = "Average GDP per cap") +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  aes(color = continent)
```
